B

BitmapFontPacker - Class in com.anyicomplex.gdx.tools.bmfont
BitmapFont packer library based on libGDX's FreeType wrapper.
BitmapFontPacker() - Constructor for class com.anyicomplex.gdx.tools.bmfont.BitmapFontPacker
 
BitmapFontPacker.Configuration - Class in com.anyicomplex.gdx.tools.bmfont
Configuration of the packing process.
BitmapFontPacker.ExitCode - Class in com.anyicomplex.gdx.tools.bmfont
Process's exit codes.
BitmapFontPacker.PlatformSupport - Interface in com.anyicomplex.gdx.tools.bmfont
For multi-platform adaptation.
bold - Variable in class com.anyicomplex.gdx.tools.bmfont.BitmapFontPacker.Configuration
Whether the font is bold
borderColor - Variable in class com.anyicomplex.gdx.tools.bmfont.BitmapFontPacker.Configuration
Border color; only used if borderWidth > 0
borderGamma - Variable in class com.anyicomplex.gdx.tools.bmfont.BitmapFontPacker.Configuration
Values < 1 increase the border size.
borderStraight - Variable in class com.anyicomplex.gdx.tools.bmfont.BitmapFontPacker.Configuration
true for straight (mitered), false for rounded borders
borderWidth - Variable in class com.anyicomplex.gdx.tools.bmfont.BitmapFontPacker.Configuration
Border width in pixels, 0 to disable
